about.server: Self Hosted Bare-Metal Servers on Beelink GTR6 - AMD Ryzen 9 6900HX and 64GB of DDR5 | Emergency power source for each server node.
about.company: RUMOR Stake Pool mission is to run a world financial system from a home in Croatia and showing everyone can take part of decentralizing Cardano. Regardless where you are I want to make sure that staking and extra rewards are easy and accessible to you. |
